description:
Morihito Otogi is a teenager with ogre strength. His childhood friend, Nico, is coming home after completing her witch training! Following an old pact, they begin living together. Nico`s very excited to be reunited with Morihito and her heart won`t stop pounding. Along with the "clumsy" Nico bringing in a whirlwind of inescapable, fantastical magical troubles, can Morihito protect Nico from a dire prophecy? Nico and Morihito`s magical comedy begins!
Source: Crunchyroll
